name: Harold Game
description: Hey, Cool Cats! Do you like games? Of course you do! Since you like games, you should totally play Harold Game. This game consists of a little wormy boi named Harold. However, Harold's style is very dull. Luckily, you will be able to show him how to look as dapper as possible. CONTROLS: Space to change color, A to change faces, S to change hats, D to reset, and W to return to menu.
